content.webTitle: IBM Power5 to follow Intel into multi-threading

fields.headline: IBM Power5 to follow Intel into multi-threading
fields.bodyText: IBM is to add Simultaneous Multi-Threading technology (SMT) to its Power5 server processor for shipment next year, reports Extreme Tech. Intel has been shipping what it calls Hyperthreading in Xeon versions of the Pentium, and last year announced it for the Pentium 4 line.
